p: Antifungal activity of ME, AE, CF and EAF of J. mimosifolia was investigated against three fungal strains; i.e., Aspergillus fumigatus, Aspergillus flavus and Fusarium oxysporum ( Table 7). ME exhibited good antifungal activity (94%, 91% and 95%) while EAF showed 90%, 88% and 93% inhibition against A. fumigatus, A. flavus and F. oxysporum, respectively. The ranking order of extracts and fractions for antifungal potential was ME > EAF > CF > AE.
